system.effect:
The Character has several glands implanted into them. These Duplicate the effect of a Respirator (+30 to Toughness Tests to resist effects of gas, can reroll failed results). The Character becomes immune to most Toxins, including the Toxic Weapon Quality.
These Glands can also as a +20 Willpower Test inject one of: Frenzon, Slaught, Stimm, or Spur as a Free Action. If failed, gland malfunctions for 1d5 days. The Character does not need to test for ill effects of these drugs, and do not suffer from excessive drug use or addiction.

If failed, gland malfunctions for 1d5 days. The Character does not need to test for ill effects of these drugs, and do not suffer from excessive drug use or addiction.
